-- List of Attributes For Docs -- 

name ~ Name of Monster
description ~ Description of Monster
image ~ Image path for Monster (From API's Github)
cost ~ Market Price for Monsters 
|-> Island Specific Costs do exist! 

> mythicalCost
> shugabushCost
> colossingumCost
> etherealCost
> plasmaCost
> mechCost
> shadowCost
> amberCost
> shantyPrice - NOTE: Fix this to be shantyCost for consistancy 
> ascensionCost 

islands ~ Islands that said Monster is on
breedingCombo ~ The breeding Combinations for a monster
breedingTime ~ Breeding Time (Currently Only Breeding Time & Enhanced Time)
|-> Island Specific Times do exist! Here are the ones available (More can/will be introduced if I realise I missed a group!):

> etherealBreedingTime

fuguingTime ~ For PC Monsters 
synthesisTime - For EW Monsters
orbTime ~ Time For Orb Hatching (Nexus)
transpositionCost ~ Cost for teleporting Monsters to Nexus or Paironormal Carnival
polarity ~ For Wublin Monsters 
powerUpTime ~ Shows the amount of time you have to fill a Wublin


-----------
The main goal of this is for the future docs that will be created to document this API :)
